metadata.title: CVE-2019-1986 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In SkSwizzler::onSetSampleX of SkSwizzler.cpp, there is a possible out ofbounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remoteescalation of privilege in system_server with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product:Android. Versions: Android-9. Android ID: A-117838472.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
